Key Match Events: Gallen held a no-hitter in the seventh inning
Corey Seager homered to break the 0–0 tie
Arizona went 0-for-9 with runners in scoring position against Eovaldi
Alek Thomas overran the ball on the third single, allowing two runs to score in the ninth inning
Marcus Semien homered to make it 5–0 in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Nathan Eovaldi had a similar performance in the 2018 World Series for the Red Sox, but it ended in a loss
The Rangers were powered by a half-billion dollar middle infield and a collection of mercenary starting pitchers
Post-Match Reflections: Eovaldi delivered a performance he can remember fondly
The Rangers fulfilled the promise they made to one another this spring
The game remained close until the top of the ninth, when the Diamondbacks' closer allowed three consecutive singles to open the frame
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went 18 innings in the 2018 World Series
Eovaldi took control of the moment when Texas most needed him
Corey Seager won his second World Series MVP award
Others: Nathan Eovaldi's 97 pitches in relief saved the bullpen in the 2018 World Series
Rick Porcello wept as he watched Eovaldi's performance in the 2018 World Series
The Rangers lost 102 games two years ago and 94 in 2022
